official-title.#text:
To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular
			 Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance
			 Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5155 IH: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.
